```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r}
join_df <- house_elections %>%
              left_join(committees, by=c("state"= "cmte_state"))
join_df
```

```{r}
fec_df<- join_df %>%
      select(state, candidate_name, party, primary_votes, ge_winner, incumbent, cmte_name)
fec_df
```


```{r}
cont_1 <- contributions %>%
  select(name,transaction_amt, state)%>%
  filter(transaction_amt < 0, state== c("NY", "TX", "FL"))
cont_1
```

```{r}
cont_2 <- contributions %>%
  select(name,transaction_amt, state)%>%
  filter(transaction_amt > 0, state== c("NY", "TX", "FL"))
cont_2
```

```{r}
cont_1_join <- fec_df %>%
    left_join(cont_1, by = c("cmte_name" = "name"))
cont_1_join
```

```{r}
cont_2_join <- fec_df %>%
  left_join(cont_2, by = c("cmte_name" = "name"))
cont_2_join
```
